summary: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.
cast: Gregory Peck|Dorothy McGuire|John Garfield|Celeste Holm|Anne Revere|June Havoc|Albert Dekker|Jane Wyatt|Dean Stockwell|Nicholas Joy|Sam Jaffe|Harold Vermilyea|Ransom M. Kemp|Victor Kilian|Mike Lally|Raymond Largay|Gustave Lax|George Leigh|Lewis Leverett|Carl M. Leviness|Arthur Little Jr.|Kathleen Lockhart|King Lockwood|Louise Lorimer|Ken Lynch|Lee MacGregor|Wilbur Mack|Adrienne Marden|Marion Marshall|Noel Mills|Marlyn Monk|Henry Mowbray|Howard Negley|Gene Nelson|John Newland|Stella Rae|Herbert Ratner|Pattie Robbins|Roy Roberts|Edwin Rochelle|Paul Russell|Wallace Scott|Larry Steers|Amzie Strickland|Laura Treadwell|Robert Warwick|Jesse White|Frank Wilcox|Barbara Wooddell|Mary Worth
title: La barrera invisible
